授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the intermediate level.
到達目標: This course will concentrate on developing and improving the English speaking skills of the students. At the end of the year, the students will be expected to: engage in informal day-to-day conversations without difficulty, discuss current issues relevant to their lives as Japanese and as citizens of the world，make short presentations on non-technical topics, demonstrate confidence as an English speaker, and speak a variety of English that is comprehensible not only to Japanese but also to non-Japanese English-speaking people.

トピック.授業計画1: *Please note that this schedule may require modification.
トピック.授業外学習2: Homework, preview and review as assigned by the instructor.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【150】英語II（コミュニケーション）　７／English II (Communication)
